title: Provides Data on Cambridge, MA Dogs
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(camDogs) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: Dogs of Cambridge, MA — camDogs
text: tibble 3,942 rows 7 variables: Dog_Name name Dog_Breed breed Breed_Binary binary whether "Mixed" "Single" breed Latitude_masked approximate latitude dog's home Longitude_masked approximate longitude dog's home Neighborhood Cambridge neighborhood dog lives
